sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' // import search from '../' import './index.sass' import logic from '../../logic' class Results extends Component { handleOnDetail = recipeUri => { this.props.onDetail(recipeUri) } render() { const user = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem('user')) const maxCalories = logic.caloriesCounter(user.gender, user.height, user.weight, user.birthDate, user.lifeStyle) console.log(maxCalories) const { recipes } = this.props return
{ recipes.map(recipe => (
{recipe.recipe.label}
{recipe.recipe.totalTime ?
Cooking time
{recipe.recipe.totalTime} minutes
:
}
)) }
} } export default Results
